strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. He lost his parents at a young age and was taken in by another family. He was like a true brother to their two children, Maria and Leon, and to Guy, another parentless child who came to live with them. When his homeland is destroyed by the Palamecian army, he is forced to flee. After leaving Fynn, he and his friends encounter Princess Hilda, the leader of the rebel army, and are saved by her. Without any home to return to, he, Maria, and Guy throw their lot in with the rebels.
strings.fusion:
The wild rose...
It is how we recognize one another.
The very reason for our struggle.
strings.summon:
The Empire took everything from me.
Are you fighting to reclaim peace, too?
Then I'll gladly join you!

strings.evolution:
I will summon every last bit of my strength...
That we may all live in peace again!
strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. His homeland, Fynn, is targeted by the Palamecian Empire, whose aim is to rule the entire world. Firion loses his home and joins the rebellion, along with his friends and fellow survivors, Maria and Guy. They throw themselves into the fight against the empire. Firion has a strong sense of justice and the wise judgment needed in a leader, yet also a certain weakness when it comes to women, which allows him to be tricked by the pirate Leila, and even once by a monster disguised as Princess Hilda.
strings.fusion:
I've learned to be wary of women,
and anyone offering me a free ride.
Should I trust in this power?
strings.summon:
I won't bend to oppression.
I'll fight for my ideals to the end!
If you feel the same, let us go forth together!

strings.evolution:
I will take back what we've lost!
That is why we've come this far!
strings.affinity:
My friends give me strength.
Nothing would make me happier than to make you feel the same.
strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. To defeat the Palamecian Empire, which destroyed his homeland, he joins the rebel army led by Fynn's own Princess Hilda. His friend and adopted brother Leon also survived the fall of Fynn, but now stands against him as a key member of the Palamecian army. Firion loses many allies, including the White Wizard Minwu, and is toyed with continually by cruel fate, but never do his eyes stray from his goal: to put a stop to the Emperor of Palamecia.
strings.fusion:
I will not stand down from this fight.
This is our battle...
You have to let us finish it!
strings.summon:
I won't let my friends' sacrifices be in vain!
I'll build a new future with my own hands!

strings.evolution:
No matter what trials befall us,
we must keep moving forward.
strings.affinity:
My friends give me strength.
Nothing would make me happier than to make you feel the same.
strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from a distant world, where he features in a story of an empire and the rebellion against it. Firion joined the rebel army led by Princess Hilda in order to recover his homeland of Fynn from the clutches of the Palamecian Empire. Unfortunately, however, the war costs Firion many of his allies and he is left to cope with the grief accompanying their loss. Eventually he welcomes back his childhood friend turned Dark Knight for the empire, Leon, and together they face off against the Emperor seeking to destroy their world.
strings.fusion:
Believe in the future, and push forward!
That's all you've got to do!
strings.summon:
It seems you are able to fight without
giving up on your dreams, as well.
Allow me to assist you.
